Subskills.name: Wide Spread Epidemic
Subskills.description: Increases the power of rabies from furious strike.

Subskills.name: Down with Sickness
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poison on hit.

Subskills.name: Consumed by Hatred
Subskills.description: Striking monsters with maximum stacks of rabies consumes them ripping and crushing the monster unleashing its bones in an arc behind it dealing damage according to the rabies stacks.

Subskills.name: Furious Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the attack range of furious strike.

Subskills.name: Strike of Hate
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by furious strike.

Subskills.name: Blade Uppercut
Subskills.description: Chance to slice monsters stunning and knocking them up dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Serious Fever
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of rabies stacks.

Subskills.name: Fueled Anger
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed when using furious strike.

Subskills.name: The Absolute Unit
Subskills.description: Striking a monster causes it to emmit fire damage based on your life replenish over time for a short duration on a radius around it when using holy form. Striking a monster unleashes impaling spikes dealing additional damage and a chance to replenish a portion of your maximum life on hit when using unholy form.

Subskills.name: Mediocre Unit
Subskills.description: Chance to spawn healing orbs from targets on hit when in holy form. Chance to unleash piercing enraged rats spreading rabies on hit when in unholy form.

Subskills.name: Stay Still
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned target.

Subskills.name: Spread the Word
Subskills.description: Chance to summon enraged flies on hit orbiting you and inflicting rabies.

Subskills.name: Flames of Fury
Subskills.description: Striking a monster inflicted with rabies causes flaming cinders to fly around the target lightning the ground on fire. Striking a monster with maximum stacks of rabies additionally consumes the stacks unleashing a scorching nova inflicting burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Sick to the Core
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum stacks of rabies and damage dealt by furious strike.
